original_text: For the days will come upon you, when your enemies will set up a barricade around you and surround you and hem you in on every side
korean_text: 날이 이를지라 네 원수들이 토둔을 쌓고 너를 둘러 사면으로 가두고

sentences.original_text: For the days will come upon you
when your enemies will set up a barricade around you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 원수들이 너희를 둘러싸고 흙벽을 쌓을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and hem you in on every side
